content: give your cold weather wardrobe a boost with the warm styling of this crocheted hat and cowl set stitched in bernat plentiful you ll love to bundle up in this wonderful ensemble that s sure to keep the cold out while keeping you looking great pattern will teach you half_double_crochet half_double_crochet around front and back posts working in the round cowl and working flat hat the best part about this pattern is that you get 2 fantastic accessories from a single ball of yarn
